meanings.definition: The state or quality of being diluted.
meanings.sent1: The dilutenesses of the drink made it taste weak.
meanings.sent2: The dilutenesses of the paint affected its color intensity.
meanings.sent3: The dilutenesses of the soup turned it into flavored water.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a dilutenesses that hinted at hidden sadness.
meanings.sent5: The dilutenesses of the perfume lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: The extent to which a substance has been diluted.
meanings.sent1: The dilutenesses of the medicine made it less effective.
meanings.sent2: The dilutenesses of the solution affected its potency.
meanings.sent3: The dilutenesses of the juice made it taste like watered-down fruit.
meanings.sent4: The dilutenesses of his words softened the impact of his criticism.
meanings.sent5: The dilutenesses of the ink caused the colors to blend together.

meanings.sent1: The dilutenesses of the mixing process determined the final strength of the solution.
meanings.sent2: The dilutenesses of the recipe required adding more water.
meanings.sent3: The dilutenesses of the paint involved adding white to lighten the color.
meanings.sent4: The dilutenesses of her actions diluted the impact of her apology.
meanings.sent5: The dilutenesses of the detergent helped clean the stain effectively.
